body:
I have a working mapview application in which I can hit a service and show GPoints on the map as overlay.

What I want to do next is show an encoded Gpolyline as an overlay on my mapView.
When I try to instantiate a GPolyline poline object in my main activity, eclipse doesnt recognize the class. Is there a library import I am missing?

A quick example of adding a GPolyline to the mapView in an android application will be a great help.

Thanks,
Prachi Gupta
title: GPolyline overlay in android MapView
